name: Goop Escape
description:
Make it to Safety!

The Poisonous Goop has taken over the Slime Kingdom! The slimes must head to safety or else they will be taken over by the Goop.

Meet Charlesworth

Charlesworth is the protagonist of Goop Escape. He was asleep during the attack on Slime Kingdom. Now he must hurry to catch up with his friends!

What Can Charlesworth do?

He can jump! The land is full of goopy spikes that can hurt him. Avoid them to stay alive.

Survive the Challenge

The level is short but has a few challenging obstacles. Try to make it through with minimal damage!
